column5: Card Description
Uses her vampiric physical prowess to rush by at blinding speed and attack the enemy.
Uses magic circles to fire bat bullets. The circles\' positions are random\, but their wide spread and successive firing makes them useful for feints and zoning.
An aura-wrapped attack to the sky. Though there are many weaknesses\, she is invincible for a while\, which makes this very useful in counters and combos.
Rushes to the back wall and flies back to attack. The angle of attack is always fixed\, but it grazes bullets.
You can perform this attack up to three times by repeating the input. Very powerful if it hits three times.
Shoots a chain-shaped red aura towards the enemy. The chain tracks the enemy\, and if the button is held\, it is possible for this attack to change into one that binds the enemy instead.
Releases a high-speed wedge-shaped bullet from a kick. Defenseless against ground attacks\, but is very effective against airborne enemies.
Moves towards the ceiling\, feints and swoops down for a diving attack onthe opponent.
Blinks in behind the opponent and slices the enemy. Because she has to go behind the opponent\, the attack is a bit slow\, but you can mix up attack speeds for max effect.
Throws magic bundled together in spear form. Charging the attack will increase the number of spears thrown.
Hugs the opponent and sucks their blood. Because she has to approach from the front\, there\'s quite a gap. The move can not be blocked and recovers life\, so this move can definitely exert pressure.
Gathers magic and forms a cross\, then throws it at the enemy in a jumping attack. Casually forming a cross as if it were nothing is part of her appeal.
This technique which burns away the surroundings with a red aura can easily be used to turn the tables at a critical moment. It\'s a spell with a scope that can easily hit mid-air enemies.
Pierces the enemy in an instant with a spearlike aura attack. Aura can be used as a weapon in many ways.
Directly attack by activating vampiric energies. She\'s not invincible\, but she can move in the air afterwards\, so it\'s a card with great latitudes of freedom.
A superior version of Red the Nightless Castle. The damage and attack range are drastically increased. It\'s definitely a card for a Scarlet Devil.
Upgraded Heart Break. The spear\'s size and power are increased. Its speed is like a laser; even at a distance it can pierce the enemy instantly.
An attack surrounded by red magical auras. The best counter and combo maker\, in terms of speed and range. The cradle of the demon is an express train to hell.
Quickly jumps up the wall\, then rams the enemy with a spinning body blow. It can easily pierce through a barrage\, and the enemy can be confused when you move behind them.
Fire out many chains made from red aura that chase the enemy.
Creates a magical aura that drains life from the opponent on hit. It\'s very strong\, but while its active\, her defense is lowered\, so it\'s a double-edged sword.
Mows down the enemy with all her strength. The only way to avoid this move is to move out of range. As she says\, \Isn\'t this an elegant move?\" Broken moves are also vampiric in nature."
